archimate:Requirement.name: 4.57.4 Cloud service monitoring control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Regular monitoring should be performed to ensure the ongoing secure use of cloud services , which includes: managing vulnerabilities by perform-ing vulnerability scanning, conducting regular penetration tests, considering crowdsourced penetration testing and carrying out code reviews extending security event manage-ment into the cloud environment by using a cloud-based security infor-mation and event management (SI-EM) platform, connecting the cloud environment to an on-premises SIEM and/or leveraging a managed security service provider (MSSP) integrating the use of cloud services into an appropriate security incident management process through creat-ing a cloud security incident man-agement capability, establishing a cloud security incident management process and developing cloud ser-vice-specific security incident man-agement plans.'
